name: Straw Hat Samurai
summary: In medieval Japan, clan wars threaten to devastate the country. The united army of Aka and Ryu are about to invade the southern lands. If they manage to fortify the mountain passage, there is no chance to take victory. The wise general selects a samurai to set off on a dangerous quest to rush forward and defeat the enemy commander thus giving time for the friendly forces to march to the mountain passage. Use swipe movements to use your sword and complete the mission in the action game free online.
